name: VR Haunted Forest Escape
description:
Our forest is haunted and filled with supernatural creatures. The only way to win is to break the curse and destroy supernatural Scarecrow. Find 10 pages before your flashlight runs out of battery power. Pick up batteries that you find on your way to buy more time. This Vr game is not for easily scared. There are a lot of jumpscares and the background can also be very terrifying. The Extraordinary atmosphere can make this VR horror game feel very real.

Note #1: We recommend you to play VR Haunted Forest Escape with headset and in dark place.

Note #2: This app requires a VR headset (Google Cardboard, Durovis Dive, Dodocase VR, VRelia GO, Homido, Gear VR) for best results.
